p: Neurological-related disorders are seen as increasingly important aspects of welfare. It is reported that a diet containing polyphenols, associated to regular exercise, represents an effective non-pharmacological approach that prevents the progression of neurodegenerative diseases. Broderick et al. confirmed that resveratrol decreased neuroinflammation and accumulation of Aβ oligomers, increased levels of neurotrophins and decreased markers of apoptosis, autophagy, endolysosomal degradation and ubiquitination in mouse brains in an in vivo model of Alzheimer’s disease [ 8].
